Summary: Its apparent we have visitors flying around in our airspace!
divs: Sighting DetailsPeople we have reports flying into mufon left and right each day. And I have seen the ufos myself everynight and they appear everynight at the same and place. People of all creeds and colors are reporting the same thing and the sightings are increasing 2 fold. These aliens are here for reason and they will not leave on theyre accordance. The airforce tries to get rid of them and they wont leave. They are here to stay as long the troubles on Earth would stop. They are policing the world and watching our activities on a everday basis. They are cosmic baby-sitters because the human race cannot takecare of themselves without being watched. The human race thinks we are it, wrong! rethink again and geta grip on reality. Remember something! They are sending a message from the skies and soon to be the answer may come quickly.
